contentrichtext.text: '''Vladimir Petrov''' may refer to: *[[Vladimir Petrov (director)]] (1896–1966), Soviet film director *[[Vladimir Mikhaylovich Petrov (diplomat)]] (1907–1991), Soviet diplomat who defected to Australia *[[Vladimir Nikolayevich Petrov]] (1915–1999), writer, teacher, and former prisoner of the Soviet Gulag *[[Vladimir Petrov (director)]] (1896–1966), Soviet film director *[[Vladimir Petrov (footballer)]] (born 1940), Soviet international footballer *[[Vladimir Petrov (rower)]] (born 1930), Soviet coxswain at the 1956 Summer Olympics *[[Vladimir Vladimirovich Petrov]] (born 1947), Soviet ice hockey player *[[Vladimirs Petrovs]] (1907–1943), also known as Vladimir Petrov, Latvian chess player *[[Al Blake]] (born 1961), wrestler known as Vladimir Petrov {{hndis|Petrov, Vladimir}}
